title: Imitater

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Produce a sun or imitate a plant.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can imitate any role from the plant faction, regardless of if it is in the game. This costs 1 sun.
- You may do their cheapest action for free, any other action will cost the usual amount.
- After the night, revert back to Imitater.

desc:
Post 466
*Having studied French Theater at Julienne, the Imitater went to the streets with his art, and has perfected his technique he calls "Potato stuck in a box".*
